title: Tomato 🍅 Pesto Pasta | Breakfast | Italian Food
content:
Breakfast: Tomato 🍅 Pesto Pasta  Servings: 3 Duration: 20 mins Pasta is made out of Maida / all purpose flour/ wheat flour, as I used penne rigate pasta they are made out of wheat flour. There are so many other types of pasta the way it looks different but tastes almost same. Coming to recipe, today I prepared an Italian dish which is creamy, juicy and delicious pasta. This is simple to make in minutes if you have Cooked pasta. Pesto is originated from Italy it is a kind of creamy sauce which contains basil, garlic, nuts, salt, cheese etc., You can also make Pesto sauce with Spinach 🍃, Broccoli, tomato, basil..etc., Last before month I shared spinach Pesto Pasta you can checkout the link down below. The sauce for pasta I prepared for today's recipe are tomato 🍅 , cheese, nuts, olive oil, garlic cloves, spices and more. It turned out so rich in taste, shiny texture and tastes wow 😋 It’s healthy too. Kids who doesn’t like to eat regular breakfast this is the best way, so follow the recipe and enjoy your Tomato 🍅  Pesto Pasta. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Pasta – 100 gms
  • Salt – 1 tsp
Tomato 🍅  Pesto:
  • Tomatoes - 3 - medium sized - diced
  • Dried Basil 🌿 – 1 tb sp
  • Black Pepper powder –  fine - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly flakes - 1/2 tb sp
  • Salt – 1 tsp
  • Olive oil – 1 tb sp
  • Garlic cloves – 4 – peeled off ( chopped )
  • Mozarella cheese 🧀 – 60 gms
  • Walnuts - 1/4 cup - 60 gms
Procedure: Tomato 🍅 Pesto : Process
  • Add all ingredients in mixer along with olive oil
  • Blend till smooth paste
  • Add water if required ( 80 ml )
  • Keep it aside
Process of making tomato 🍅 pesto pasta : 
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add blended paste
  • Cook 5 mins and saute in between to avoid burnt
  • Add cooked pasta ( checkout Spinach Pesto Pasta 🍃 || Italian || Breakfast/ Dinner  how to cook pasta perfectly)
  • Mix well
  • Cook more 5-7 mins until it incorporated with pasta
  • Turnoff heat and serve immediately
  • It can be serve as a breakfast/ dinner
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • If you doesn't like tomato 🍅 Pesto Pasta can checkout Spinach Pesto Pasta 🍃 || Italian || Breakfast/ Dinner
  • Instead of Walnuts you can also use almonds/ cashew nuts
  • You can also add lemon juice & spinach for toppings ( optional )
